summary: This document appears to be internal Bureau of Prisons correspondence regarding distribution of a final version PDF to reporters who contacted OPA (Office of Public Affairs) and MCC NY (Metropolitan Correctional Center New York). It mentions providing a Word version to OLA (Office of Legislative Affairs) for potential member inquiries.
locations: MCC NY (Metropolitan Correctional Center New York)
keyFacts: Document is internal Bureau of Prisons correspondence about media distribution
Approximately 50 reporters contacted OPA about the matter
Final PDF version being sent to reporters who contacted OPA and MCC NY
Word version provided to OLA for potential congressional member inquiries
Document reference EFTA00143006 suggests it's part of Epstein-related records
